name: Driving trash
description:
If you clip through the map when starting I have no idea why that's happening but a simple restart via the pause menu should fix it

Destroy as much Trash as you can in 60 seconds!

You can choose your car in the choose car menu, each car has different stats.

You can move your car with WASD and space to brake (it makes your turn faster), don't worry if you're stuck, just keep holding W or S and the game will unstuck you :).

This game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2021.2 with the theme "Let there be chaos". I started with the idea that you would need to create chaos in the city by breaking stuff (I was inspired by the Just Cause series), I then had the idea of having the city in a chaotic state with trash everywhere and you, as the player, have to break as much trash as you can in 60 seconds.
